item.title: Darkwater
item.description:
Title: Darkwater
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Targon Studios
Publisher: Playstack
Franchise: Playstack
Release Date: Apr 22, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 22, 2025




About This Game

Darkwater is a cooperative extraction horror game for 1-4 players. Take command of your own custom submarine and survive the icy depths of an alien moon.

Play solo or enlist your own submariner crew. Up to 4 players can team up and survive an onslaught of deep-sea threats. Face down enemy submarines in naval warfare and dock your vessel to abandoned outposts in order to scavenge for supplies.

A devastating disease has struck an alien planet. The government has frozen the surface of the ocean in response. You and your crew are trapped below the ice.

  • Source fuel and travel from outpost to outpost in a desperate bid for survival

  • Uncover snippets of information relating to a greater truth

  • Plan and strategize every step of the way as you fight against the relentless adversity of a desperate world

Resources are scarce. Discover and explore dilapidated underwater facilities on foot and strip them for all theyâ€™re worth. Be prepared to deal with what lurks below.

  • Face down a variety of unpredictable enemies including infected divers, deep-sea angler fish and alien crabs.

  • Even the odds using a wide range of weaponry including sledgehammers, blow torches, pistols and shotguns.

  • Make sure you and your team have enough room to carry back the fuel canisters critical to your survival - teamwork is key to ensuring you live to see another day.

Take direct control of onboard systems for piloting, weapons and sonar. Upgrade your submarine. Expand your deck, invest in different cabins, negotiate with rival vessels, but be ready for war.

  • Utilize a variety of powerful torpedoes, harpoons, decoy mines and depth charges to gain the upper hand in sub-to-sub combat

  • Board enemy vessels using a manned torpedo to deliver the ultimate in-person surprise

  • Invest in unique rooms for your submarine that help with hacking, stealth and other strategic options

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Players will fight divers, automatons, and alien creatures.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 @ 3.00GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 11 GB available space

item.title: Throne of Bone
item.description:
Title: Throne of Bone
Genre: Strategy
Developer: Windmill Slam
Publisher: Windmill Slam
Release Date: Apr 22, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 8, 2024




About This Game

Rise, Necromancer! The world left you for dead, but death was never the end. Awaken once more, summon your undead legions, and reclaim your throne in a turn-based strategy game that fuses roguelike tactics with autobattler mayhem.

The bones of the fallen are yours to shape. Draft from over 50 unique minions, each with strengths to exploit and weaknesses to mend. Experiment with synergies, adapt your strategy, and let your forces march to war. Mortality is but a trivial concern.

Victory earns you skulls, the currency of conquest, so spend them wisely. Between battles, retreat to your castle and embrace the true work of necromancy. Perform dark rituals, train your minions, and unravel the mysteries of your ancestral keep.

Your minions may fight on their own, but your power reaches beyond the grave. Unleash spells mid-battle to shift the odds. Bolster your undead to weaken your foes. A well-timed spell can mean the difference between victory and another trip to the grave.

The strategic depth of drafting-roguelikes combines with streamlined experience of an autobattler. Each run offers new choices, new threats, and new opportunities to perfect the art of undeath. The path to power is paved with bonesâ€¦ will they be yours or your enemiesâ€™?

- 60+ Unique minions with undying dedication

- 70+ Necromantic spells to sway combat in your favor

- 50+ Rewards to empower you as your reclaim your kingdom

- Numerous Castle Activities to add variety to your runs!

Descrierea conÈ›inutului pentru adulÈ›i indisponibilÄƒ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 or later
    • Processor: 2GHz or better
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1920x1080, post-2012 graphics hardware
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: OSX 12 or later
    • Processor: 2GHz or better
    • Graphics: 1920x1080, post-2012 graphics hardware
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: CyberCorp
item.description:
Title: CyberCorp
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: Megame LLC
Publisher: Megame LLC
Release Date: Apr 22, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Aug 19, 2024




About This Game

From Developer

Brutal top-down loot shooter. Similar games can be counted on one hand, as action games typically fall into the first-person or third-person perspective genres.

I tried to make something similar to The Division, Warframe or Destiny but on a smaller scale and from a top-down perspective, I played this game for hundreds of hours so that affected the development process :)

My game encourages an aggressive and push-forward playstyle, allowing you to combine various techniques and create impressive equipment-based combos.

Everyone can create their own build, whether itâ€™s close combat, skills, or long-range sniping. If you enjoy top-down action games with diverse loot, then CyberCorp is exactly what you need.



You are a CyberCorp fighter. In your hands lies a unique and dangerous technology - the Synth, a remotely controlled combat shell.
Are you ready to take your weapon and return order to the streets of the city?

Flexible progression system


Upgrade your equipment using a card-based system of weapon and armor enhancements. Build and customize to match your playstyle.

Multiplayer


Play story and side missions with friends or random players. Equip smart and make builds for multiplauer combos.

Slums, factories, laboratories, elite residential complex


Complete missions in various locations, explore the city of the future. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of cyberpunk.

Fast paced gameplay

Defend objects, hack security systems, capture control points, and uncover hidden items.

Loot shooter

Choose your difficulty level and get the rewards. There's something for those who seek a more casual experience or a hardcore challenge.

Procedural level generation

Map, enemies, loot, encounters, weather, boss, reward are all randomized each run.

Music in some trailers by Mokka & Infraction.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Celeron / AMD Phenom
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Radeon R3
    • Storage: 6 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030 / AMD RX 550
    • Storage: 10 GB available space

item.title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered
item.description:
Title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered
Genre: RPG
Developer: Bethesda Game Studios , Virtuos
Publisher: Bethesda Softworks
Franchise: The Elder Scrolls
Release Date: Apr 22, 2025




About This Game

The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivionâ„¢ Remastered modernizes the 2006 Game of the Year with all new stunning visuals and refined gameplay. Explore the vast landscape of Cyrodiil like never before and stop the forces of Oblivion from overtaking the land in one of the greatest RPGs ever from the award-winning Bethesda Game Studios.

Rediscover Cyrodiil

Journey through the rich world of Tamriel and battle across the planes of Oblivion where handcrafted details have been meticulously recreated to ensure each moment of exploration is awe-inspiring.

Navigate Your Own Story

From the noble warrior to the sinister assassin, wizened sorcerer, or scrappy blacksmith, forge your path and play the way you want.

Experience an Epic Adventure

Step inside a universe bursting with captivating stories and encounter an unforgettable cast of characters. Master swordcraft and wield powerful magic as you fight to save Tamriel from the Daedric invasion.

The Complete Story

Experience everything Oblivion has to offer with previously released story expansions Shivering Isles, Knights of the Nine, and additional downloadable content included in The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Blood and Gore
Sexual Themes
Violence



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (10.0.19043)
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X, Intel Core i7-6800K
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700, NVIDIA GeForce 1070 Ti
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 125 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Required
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11 (with updates)
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X, Intel Core i5-10600K
    • Memory: 32 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6800XT or NVIDIA RTX 2080
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 125 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Required; Performance scales with better hardware

item.title: Escape The Mad Empire
item.description:
Title: Escape The Mad Empire
Genre: Indie , RPG , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: XperimentalZ Games
Publisher: Paradox Arc
Franchise: Paradox Arc
Release Date: Apr 22, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 22, 2025




About This Game

Escape an Empire Gone Mad
The Empire has fallen. Its survivors are trapped within an apocalypse of its own creation.

Can you assemble a band of heroes and escape the Mad Empire?

Gather your Heroes
Master the full potential of a varied party of heroes, choosing from a pool of 13 classes. Unlock their full potential via skills, loot and more.

Wield Insane Loot
In its madness, the Empire used crystals to create absurd and cursed items. In Escape the Mad Empire, each piece of loot is as meaningful as it is unhinged.

Strategize in the Blink of an Eye
Masterfully employ your heroes and their items in order to survive the apocalypse. Pause the action at any moment to instantly use spells, abilities and consumables, turning the tide of the battle in your favor!

Construct Mad Machines
Your hub is your sanctuary. There you can use the Crystals of Reality to build awesome machines, which allow you to recruit, upgrade or restore heroes, buy, craft, identify or enchant gear, and more. Relax as you theorycraft the ultimate party! .

Chart Your Way Through the Apocalypse
In each daring attempt at escape, you will chart your own path through the cavernous maze dug out by the Mad Empire. Take daring risks to reap big rewards, and face bosses at the end of each run. With each successful escape, your heroes are rewarded with resources used to develop your home base, and let you continue your journey through the Mad Empireâ€™s apocalypse.

Will you Escape the Mad Empire?

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game displays cartoonish violence, mature topics like war, slavery, dystopian tyranny leading to the apocalypse and has references to alcohol consumption.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 64 bits
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or above
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 or AMD Radeon R7 265 equivalent or above
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X equivalent or above
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560 equivalent or above
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
